officialTitle: Esmolol in Cardiac Surgery. A Randomized Controlled Trial With Clinical
inclusionCriteria:
* end diastolic diameter \>60 mm and/or an ejection fraction \<50%
* written informed consent
* age \>18 years
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* previous unusual response to esmolol
* inclusion in other randomized studies
* esmolol administration in the previous 30 days
* emergency operation
